title: $:/plugins/kookma/vote
author: Mohammad Rahmani
name: Vote
readme:
<$button class="tc-btn-invisible" style="overflow: hidden;white-space: pre;width: 100%;" message="tm-open-external-window" param="https://github.com/kookma/TW-Vote">{{$:/core/images/github}} <$text text="https://github.com/kookma/TW-Vote"/></$button>

; Vote
The vote plugin lets you to rate tiddlers. Both voting and ranking of tiddlers can be done.

;Code and demo
For learning plugin features, syntax, tutorial and examples see the plugin demo and code pages

* Demo: https://kookma.github.io/TW-Vote/
* Code: https://github.com/kookma/TW-Vote
